issue.title: extra app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.extra.android

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||cdn.branch.io^
![Screenshot_20230102_143346_AdGuard](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118186787/210285813-2c0e5eeb-cf6f-4ad3-9935-6acff9782625.jpg)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Currently, I don't have an account.
If I sign up, I can write a post after 30 days due to their policy.
Anyway, please update your filters after up to 4 hours because the problematic commit was reverted a moment ago.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

현재, 저는 계정을 가지고 있지 않습니다.
만약 가입을 해도 클리앙의 정책에 의해 30일 뒤에 글을 작성할 수 있습니다.
어쨌든, 문제가 되는 커밋을 방금 전에 되돌렸으니 최대 4시간뒤에 필터를 업데이트해주세요.

</details>

issue.title: Kylie.com - Various breakage (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
 
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)~~ _(FIXED)_

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`

(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fixes:
Simply:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$domain=kylie.com`

..or more specifically:
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com`
`@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com`
In this case, the last rule is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)~~ _(FIXED)_
 
~~`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`~~

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
